SELECT tu.name as ownerName, COUNT(tt.id) as totalTranCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN tdv.type_value = '成交' THEN 1 END) as successTranCount FROM t_user tu LEFT JOIN t_clue tc ON tu.id = tc.owner_id LEFT JOIN t_customer tcr ON tc.id = tcr.clue_id LEFT JOIN t_tran tt ON tcr.id = tt.customer_id LEFT JOIN t_dic_value tdv ON tt.stage = tdv.id WHERE tu.account_no_expired = 1 AND tu.account_no_locked = 1 AND tu.credentials_no_expired = 1 AND tu.account_enabled = 1 GROUP BY tu.id, tu.name ORDER BY COUNT(tt.id) DESC
